name: AR Zombie!
description:
AR Zombie! is an ultimate augmented reality First Person Shooter game where you hold different kinds of weapons and obliterate zombies from the real world. Your goal is to defense Angel Statue as long as you can.

NOTE:
Requires a iPhone Device running iOS11 and supporting ARKit.

AR GAMEPLAY
The door connect Lost World and your real world.
It is your choice to shoot zombies in virtual world or shoot them from your real world.

INTENSE BATTLES
As a DoorKeeper in game, you have to fight waves of zombies to prevent guardian angel from ruining.
Reload at proper time could make you stay longer.

SWITCH WEAPONS
Make headshots and combos to earn more and you can arm yourself with handguns, SMGs, shotguns and rifles in weapon Shop.
